alert.note: Alert for Athens; Morgan; Perry (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 11:35PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Perry, Morgan and northwestern Athens Counties through midnight EDT... At 1134 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Buckeye Lake to 6 miles east of Hide-A-Way Hills to near Lake Hope State Park. Movement was northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Athens, New Lexington, Glouster, McConnelsville, Somerset, Shawnee, Chesterhill, Perry State Forest, Nelsonville, Thornport, Harbor Hills, Crooksville, Chauncey, Thornville, Junction City, New Straitsville, Malta, Corning, Buchtel and Stockport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Charleston West Virginia.
